column3: Welcome to Rhalgr's Reach. I shall answer any questions you have to the best of my ability.
If it isn't <Split(<Highlight>ObjectParameter(1)</Highlight>, ,1)/>, hero of the revolution! I shall answer any questions you have to the best of my ability.
What kind of place is this?
I am Houdin, a loyal member of the Resistance fighting against the Empire.
It is a hard fight, but nothing compared to what my defenseless countrymen are currently dealing with. We shall not rest until the day we taste victory!
I am Houdin, a loyal member of the Resistance that fought to free Ala Mhigo from the Empire.

We could not have done it without the help of Eorzea, Doma, and you of course, <Split(<Highlight>ObjectParameter(1)</Highlight>, ,1)/>! Now the fight is over I plan to dedicate myself to helping my homeland get back on its feet.
Rhalgr's Reach is our base of operations. We are protected by the watchful gaze of the Temple of the Fist.
It was set ablaze long ago by the mad king Theodoric, the majority of the monks there massacred. The ruins now serve as a place of refuge for those who need it.
Rhalgr's Reach is our base of operations. We are protected by the watchful gaze of the Temple of the Fist.
It was set ablaze long ago by the mad king Theodoric, the majority of the monks there massacred. The ruins served as a place of refuge for those who needed it.
However, now Ala Mhigo has been liberated, the temple has been transformed into another base of ours.
